A really good movie and great job creator!!  but am i the only one who thinks that mafia boy was terribly toxic?
I understand he loved her and all in general, but he would literally call her his thing, say that she belongs to him and he can do whatever he wants with her. He kidnapped her  and persuaded her that she couldn't leave because she belonged to him. This is not how a healthy relationship should be. As the movie itself, it was really fun to watch, but remember that, people who act like this in real life do not really love you, they just treat you as personal rewards that belong to them and cannot oppose you, everyone wants to feel safe in a relationship but it should not fall into in some kind of psychosis like that boy who expressed his love in a really strange way. Still loved it as a movie, just me having a hard time liking the male lead of the story :')
